ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He threw it down and suddenly it was a slithering snake.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So he threw it down, and lo, it became a running serpent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So he threw it down, and lo! it was a rapidly moving snake.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Moses threw it on the ground and suddenly he saw that it was a moving serpent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So Moosa put it down – thereupon it became a fast moving serpent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He cast it down, and behold! It was a snake, moving quickly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So he cast it down; and lo! it was a serpent running.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and he cast it down, and behold it was a serpent sliding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So he cast it down, and lo! it was a serpent, gliding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So he threw it down, and all of a sudden, it turned into a fast-moving serpent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So he cast it down, and lo! it was a serpent running along.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So he threw it down, and behold, it was a snake, moving swiftly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He threw it, and behold! It was a snake, active in motion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He cast it down, and behold! It was a snake, moving quickly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: So he cast it down, and thereupon it turned into a sliding serpent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So he threw it—thereupon it became a moving serpent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So he threw it down, and thereupon it was a snake, moving swiftly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:20] And he cast it down, and lo! it was a serpent, a giant snake, moving swiftly, moving about on its belly swiftly with the speed of a small snake — which is called al-jānn and which is [also] used to refer to this [serpent] in another verse [Q. 27:10; Q. 28:31].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: So he cast it down) from his hand, (and Lo! it was a serpent, gliding) and when it lifted its head up, Moses run away from it.
